name: mind your wild horses
description:
Ready to frame 8x10 matted print. Comes matted and in a poly bag. 

Let these whimsical collages remind you to 'scattergood wherever you go'. Charming and colorful, they feature artisit written quotes and are endearing and positive. Individually signed, titled and matted by the artisit.

Display individually or in groupings of two or more. Great gifts or for yourself.

Custom orders accepted; email for orders or with questions.

name: memorize beauty
description:
Ready to frame 5x7 print of an original collage with mat. Comes matted and in a poly bag. 

Let these whimsical collages remind you to 'scattergood wherever you go'. Charming and colorful, they feature artisit written quotes and are endearing and positive. Individually signed, titled and matted by the artisit.

I donate a portion of the proceeds to my scattergood scholarship fund, dedicated to helping people scattergood wherever they go.

Display individually or in groupings of two or more. Great gifts or for yourself.

Custom orders accepted; email for orders or with questions.
